alert.note: Alert for Charleston; Inland Berkeley; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 9:06PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG OVER PARTS OF CHARLESTON AND BERKELEY COUNTIES... Surface observations and area webcams show fog continues to expand across parts of Charleston and Berkeley Counties this evening. The fog has become locally dense in places with visibilities 1/4 mile or less. The lowest visibilities are occurring near bodies of water such as Charleston Harbor and the Wando, Stono, Ashley and Cooper Rivers. The fog is expected to slowly expand overnight with the risk for more significant dense fog increasing, especially after midnight. A Dense Fog Advisory may be needed for some areas later tonight.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and leave extra distance ahead of you in case a sudden stop is needed.
